abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid32633728, pmid32633628, pmid32640479, pmid32646930, pmid32633720, pmid32640127, pmid32634026, pmid32640487, pmid32639930, pmid32633327, pmid32640098, pmid32633594, pmid32645175, pmid32639569, pmid32647056, pmid32576319, pmid32639570, pmid32647307, pmid32579022, pmid32627689, pmid32640020, pmid32555134, pmid32621757, pmid32640483, pmid32543756
name: Covid-19 LST Report 2020.07.13
